name: 8 Ball - Billiards pool games
description:
【8 Ball - billiards pool game】
Simulate the reality of the billiard - 8 ball play, simple operation, configure the precise physics engine and accurate goal positioning!
Come and enjoy billiards collisions with friends all over the world !

【Game Features】:
- Realistic 3D physics ball
- Touch control for moving the stick
- Once a day free Lucky Turntable
- Accurate pool and billiards physics engine
- Hundreds exclusive pool cue
- 5 combinations of beautiful pool tables and frames
- Multiple sports games modes: Fancy Billiards ,1vs1 Online Billiards ,pool practice ,compete with AI,Challenge your friends

Enjoy the billiard ball collision. You will be the next master of billiards!
